findings.title: Confidentiality may be perpetual / indefinite
findings.rationale: Indefinite confidentiality can create long-term compliance burden and uncertainty around retention and disclosure.

Licensor's liability is unlimited and not subject to any limitation of liability clause.

7. CONFIDENTIALITY
Confidentiality obligations survive termination and continue in perpetuity.

8. WARRANTIES AND DISCLAIMERS
Licensor disclaims all warranties, express or implied, including merchantability and fitness for a particular purpose.
